verbs.description: [ARG1: Stormy Daniels] [V: appeared] [ARGM-LOC: on ' SNL '] [ARGM-LOC: alongside Ben Stiller playing Trump 's lawyer Michael Cohen and Martin Short as the president 's physician Harold Bornstein] .
Stormy Daniels appeared on ' SNL ' alongside [ARG0: Ben Stiller] [V: playing] [ARG1: Trump 's lawyer Michael Cohen] and Martin Short as the president 's physician Harold Bornstein .
